label: applicableTradeSettlement
comment: The trade settlement header applicable to this supply chain trade transaction.

rangeIncludes.comment: The information, at a header level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction, with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, such as a commercial invoice.

domainIncludes.comment: Agreement, contract, exchange, understanding, or transfer of cash or property that occurs between two or more parties.
